Entries.dumped_Guys: @, I thought you were more honorable than that.#$e#Dating the whole town, that's not something I thought you would do.$s
Entries.summer_10{{YearRemainder}}: I've caught so much fish for the luau's buffet tomorrow, @, it'll be a wonderful display of our sea's riches.
Entries.winter_Mon8: It's mighty important for us to protect our fisheries, cuz we don't, we might have no fish in the future.

Entries.4{{YearRemainder}}: Thinkin' of taking that boat of mine out for a fishing trip, what do you think, @?

Entries.6{{YearRemainder}}: I also sell tackle. Find them mighty useful for catching difficult fish...
Entries.7{{YearRemainder}}: How am I supposed to compete against those big ships that scrape the sea bottom?$s
Entries.8{{YearRemainder}}: Some of these lobsters can be up to a hundred years old, @.#$b#We usually throw back the ones that're breeding, that way they'll make more lobsters.$h

Entries.6_2: My family's been from the Fern Islands as far as I can remember.
Entries.7_2: Catfish are my favorite fish.#$b#They make for a good fish fry too!
Entries.8_2: When I was younger, I'd head out to sea for months at a time.
